title: Initial G: The Virgin and Child
description: Initial G: The Virgin and Child; Workshop of Gerard Horenbout (Flemish, 1465 - 1541); Ghent (illuminated; probably), Belgium; about 1500; Tempera colors and gold paint on parchment; Leaf: 15.2 x 11.1 cm (6 x 4 3/8 in.); Ms. Ludwig IX 17, fol. 106; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
